snippet.title: SuperHotLine Miami Walkthrough
snippet.description:
This is a walkthrough of the game "SuperHotLine Miami".

Play the game here: https://albatr.itch.io/superhotline-miami

You can visit my Patreon page if you want or something:
https://www.patreon.com/awalkthroughlife

Game created by albatr
Music:
Pitch Black - Machinimasound
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RXLUSLJQT2Y
___________
Game description (from creator):
What happens when you mix SUPER HOT with Hotline Miami ? You get SUPERHOTline Miami ! Time moves only when you move, but this time, from a top down perspective and with some extra violence. This is an upgraded version of the original SUPERHOTline Miami, it features many improvements used by its sequel SHOOTOUT Inc (The full game based on SUPERHOTline Miami), such as improved bullet hit detection, better hitboxes, AI reworks, new sprites and animations etc.
